hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd /ansible-elk-playbook echo pwd export HOME=/home/`whoami` ansible-playbook -i ./hosts ./ec2-noVPC.yml vpcid=$(aws ec2 describe-vpcs --region us-east-1 --filter Name=tag-value,Values="Project_VPC" --query 'Vpcs[*].VpcId' --output text) subnetid=$(aws ec2 describe-subnets --region us-east-1 --filters "Name=vpc-id,Values=$vpcid" --query 'Subnets[*].SubnetId' --output text) ansible-playbook -i ./hosts ec2-basic.yml --extra-vars "vpcid=$vpcid vpc_subnet=$subnetid" #ansible-playbook -i hosts --tags "setup" ec2.yml --extra-vars "vpcid=$vpcid vpc_subnet=$subnetid" #ansible-playbook -i hosts --tags "vinkar" ec2.yml #ansible-playbook -i hosts --tags "provision" ec2.yml
